name: brave-capture-v2
description: Chrome extension for capturing and tracking CLM positions across 9 DeFi protocols with AI-powered extraction, automated quality control, instant dashboard cache performance, and unified token exposure tracking

scripts.test:parsers: node tests/test-hyperliquid-parser.js && node tests/test-aave-deduplication.js && node tests/test-price-slider.js
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:db && npm run test:integration && npm run test:parsers && npm run test:tokens
